title: NEWS: Ingenico integration; Shapeshifting skeleton; and Desktop robot
description:
Ingenico POS terminals get upgraded; What you might not know about Ukraine; a Skeleton comes out of ShapeShift's closet; Jeffrey Tucker publishes; Makerarm wants to make your life easier; Headphones for the health-conscious.
